content.detailedDescription:
Over the past several months, i have been witnessing a phenomenon of ufos appearing in the washington d.C. metropolitan area.  on 18 may 2012, i was at the fort washington park in fort washington, m.D. and i observed a ufo hovering in the distance.  i could not identify the hovering object as a model aircraft and its movements did not dictate that it was a model airplane.  

the object is capable of hovering for lengthy periods of time and is engulfed within a light that obscures the actual vessel from ground based observation.  this object has been observed on multiple occasions and mimics the planet venus' position within the sky.  after some research, this type of activity has been recorded.  yemme discussed similar observations made by united states military observers within the book "ufo - evaluating the evidence" describing a accident when a military aircraft collided with an unknown object in midair.
 
"at the time of the sighting, venus was in a position which coincided with that of the ufo.  the planet's angular distance from the sun was rather small, but it was still bright enough to be seen by day.  it is possible that venus was the cause of this sighting and was observed by some of the witnesses on the ground." (51)

the unidentified object within this video will shift its position very slightly and in the background you can hear an airplane flying overhead.  i attempted to zoom in with my camcorder but was not able to obtain a clear view of the object emanating the light.  i am always in awe to observe these objects.

after observing the object, i departed the location for home.  i seek assistance to document other ufo activity within the area.  please feel free to have this video analyzed for authenticity.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Phenomenon of alien probes in washington dc metro area

content.detailedDescription:
I was going deer hunting one morning and i was hunting near paynes creek area
of hart county. i pulled into the land and was early. so i was sitting in my truck til closer to time to go into woods. i see a round object i thought was a star. i was watching it and notice it was moving from side to side. it came closer and closer. it floated in front of my truck for 15-20 mins. then it slowly moved behind my truck while i kept my eyes on it. it finally got out of sit and i waited until daylight to go into the woods.

a few days later i go back one morning and it was raining and saw the same thing just as before.
a few days later i go back one morning and there is a big ditch next to where i park my truck. as i was pulling in i thought to myself that a friend of mine was there hunting also that morning because there was lights in the parking area. as i get closer the lights dim and go away. all that was there was a ditch. there is no other way out or in to the area. after that i quit hunting in the area and have not been back. there is no houses around the area. it was about tree top high.
content.summary: Glowing orb floating in front of my truck and moved above and behind me.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in downtown toronto and usually there's too much pollution to see the stars but it was a clear, cloudless night last night (wed. july 11, 2012).  at approximately 10:45 p.M. i went outside to take out the garbage and water the lawn.  i was standing on my ground-level patio looking up at the distant stars (i've done so for years) just to take in the night sky but i also try and see if i can spot anything way up high, whether i'm in the city or out in the countryside where the night sky is amazing.  i belive that i've seen satellites in the past and have also seen some interesting lights that appear to be way too high up for planes but nothing extraordinary enough that was worth reporting.

anyway, last night, because of the great night sky in the city, i was looking up for about ten minutes, when i saw something nearby overhead - i caught it in my periphery to my right (i was facing east) and quickly looked at it (i wrote down this observation last night along with a crude sketch but i didn't bring it with me to work today, if you want to see it, email me and i'll scan it and send it to you).  at first it appeared to be two dull, white lights moving and blinking / pulsating in unison (i.E. if you were to say a plane's lights were equivalent to a 100 watt bulb, then these lights were 25 watts by comparison).  it came from a s-e direction a few hundred feet above a nearby apartment building, moving in a n-w direction.  when i focused my attention to the lights, i could see the sky between them but they appeared to be joined by some type of invisible wing because the space in between them was hazy, like what the road looks like when it's really hot outside with the waves of heat.  so it struck me as a single object - a straight wing - that was cloaked, yet there were two dull white lights pulsating, or blinking, in unison!  bizarre, and that's why i'm reporting this to you, and am not doing so in a casual manner.  as i mentioned in the short description, my gut feeling tells me that this was more of a military object rather than a ufo (i didn't sense anything otherworldly - not sure if you do under these circumstances.)  regardless, it was of a technology that i didn't think we were capable of yet - especially in canada.  and its direction and elevation made me think that it was headed towards a nearby military base. 

this object was completely silent and it was all over in 2-3 seconds (i noted 1.5 seconds in the observation report i wrote last night).  i lost sight of it when it went over my neighbour's triplex roof.

there's a fairly busy flight path over our house from planes arriving and departing from pearson int'l.  in a closer vicinity to my house is the downsview military base which has an airport. the base has been drastically reduced in size over the years and i believe that dehavilland currently has an operation running out of that base, although the military still has a small presence (parts of the base has even been transformed into canada's first urban national park and there are even concerts held there).  and when i drive by there, all signs point to a military base that is now being run by a skeleton staff.  however, i do see a number of new planes circling above my house at night and i get the sense that dehavilland are testing new models - they are usually much more quiet and sleek than the planes coming from / going to pearson.  

there were a number of planes taking off from pearson last night but this object was low to the ground in comparison.  and a few minutes after i saw this object, a small plane circled overhead quite low in the same general vicinity - this struck me as odd because you don't usually see small cesna-type planes flying around the city at that time of night.  i think it was red and white.  even though it was night and the sky was clear, there's still a great level of light pollution, so i had good visibility.

the object that i saw last night was definitely something physical but it happened so fast and it was dead silent.  yet i felt compelled to write it down last night and again this morning on this site.  i felt strongly enough about its anomolous nature that i just had to report it to you (in case anyone else in my vicinity spotted it by chance).  

what's really odd is that i think if i hadn't of written the account down last night and woken up my wife to tell her about it (she thought that she was dreaming last night when i told her), then i would have doubted myself about this sighting when i woke up this morning.  i'm still somewhat doubtful of what i saw but i have to fight that urge because there really was something physical, silent and nearly invisible that passed just above me last night.  my first thought after i'd lost sight was that it was an unmanned drone but i don't think they're cloaked (i've seen photos of uavs).  and i also thought the lights were a couple of rc toys moving together but with the haziness of the invisible wing connecting the two lights, i knew they weren't rc toys.
content.summary: My gut feeling tells me it was more military than et.

content.detailedDescription: Initially looked jut like a fireworks being shot into air, but not exploding. instead it morphed into a large pulsating red light attached to a cylindrical shaped object, and. from 1000 fett awat, began moving towards me, like i was the reason it appeared! it came right over my head. photos taken.Then it changed direction and moved very slowly away from me. estimated height 700-1000 feet! i was in front of my house. i'm a retired police officer. i've seen ufo's before, but at high altitude, such as most videos out there. i have never seen anything like this! i estimate it was launched from ground about 1000 feet from my house, which is all houses. it's initial launch ans stop in mid air was identical to fireworks. what caught my initial attention was it didn't explode. instead, it developed into an object with a very bright large pulsating red light, ans slowly came towards me! as it moved away from me , slowly, i took two photos. it gradually moved away very slowly with only light being in its center, the large red pulsating light!
content.summary: Red light shot up into air from ground and developed into an object with pulsating red light, coming to my location, then turning.

content.detailedDescription: Just heard a loud thunder / crash / sonic boom - no thunder/lightning in area (checked doppler)
content.summary: Just heard a loud thunder / crash / sonic boom - no thunder/lightning in area (checked doppler)

content.detailedDescription: Awoke at 4:44am to see 2 - 3 brilliantly white orbs/discs hovering 30 - 45 degrees above the eastern horizon (in virtually the same place i saw them 2 days ago). all 2 - 3 objects gradually moved away "in unison?" fading eastward over the next 15 minutes until they were no longer visible.  i tried using binoculars, but they were not powerful enough to get a better view.
content.summary: 2 - 3 brilliantly-white orbs/discs 30 - 45 degrees above the eastern horizon 4:44am - 5:00am

content.detailedDescription: Last night on july the 11th 2012 in the town of somerset west south africa, near the city of cape town. on our main road . i was the passanger in a stationary vehicle at the traffic light. i was looking around to see what was happening around me at the time when i saw about three round balls of light. they where rather high up at the time. then after about a minute or so. more started to appear and eventually there was about 7-9 of them in the sky. they started to move towards one side of the town. flying right in front of us in the sky. at the time i noticed that i was not the only one looking at these strange objects. a couple of other people in cars where paying their attention to them. with this now seen, the hair on my back was standing up and i started to feel notious. after about 7 minutes from this sighting they started to dissapear into thin air with the last one rising and slowly dissapearing. my whole family saw these objects. even though there was much discussion over what it could or rather should be. the object was then now called a chinease lantern. my mom and i. knew 100% that it was not a plane, helicopter or chinease lantern for these objects were far to bright and fast to be that.
content.summary: These balls of orange light started to appear. about seven of them. they hovered and moved accross the sky and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette and listening to one of my favorite songs on my ipod. the sound of the helicopter slightly overpowered the music in my headphones and that's what made me look up. since i live in the mountains, i figured it was another interesting event in the sky, given that i've seen a few up here. however, never have i come across helicopters, especially at around midnight. i took my headphones off, and at that same time the outdoor lights went dark. this was not too much of a surprise as they are on a timer, but that was not my main concern. i decided to let all lights stay off and observe what was going on. my first thought was a military mission coming back from some top-secret in the middle of the night and i took off my headphones to give a look and listen. what i saw was a helicopter with just one light on and something in front of it. i knew it was a military helicopter because of the sound and speed it was producing. it past almost overhead and that's when i noticed that it looked like it was chasing somehint... or escorting it? swear on my life i watched this helicopter follow what looked like a dim star moving at the same speed as the aircraft but a few hundred feet in front of it. this was when i thought to myself "am i actually witnessing my first ufo? after all the video i've researched online... it was uncanny. something that looks like a star but is moving in earth-real-time speed, not to mention being chased by a military chopper! my only other guess would be a drone or some other very small aircraft being covered by the helicopter, but the situation just doesn't add up for me. i saw and heard a modern u.S. military helicopter following what looked to me like a dim star moving at the same speed as its pursuer. it seemed like a pursuit and not an escort.
content.summary: Military helicopter in pursuit of a dim star-like light.

content.detailedDescription:
Mother and father were riding in there lincoln heading east from the zumbro river to highway 63 when the spotted a bright light out in the field about 15 to 20 feet off the ground keeping pace with their car.  when they stopped at a stop sign the objected stopped and his engine died as well as his radio going dead.  his headlights and all lights in the car went out at the same time.  the light then took off in the same easterly direction and my  dad then was able to restart the car and all electronics came back to normal function.  they then chased the light that was on there right side (south side) of the road and it gained speed and crossed in front of the car and shot off to the north at an incredible speed and disappeared.

this is the story that they told me when they got home and called me about the episode.

that's all i know about it.  there names were joe and oddie.  mine is jary, there son.
content.summary: Spoted bright light traveling parallel to their car followed them for 3 miles engine and radio died and light made a left hand trun in front of car and shot off to the north at a rapid speed

content.detailedDescription: Every night  around 11pm i walk my two dogs,a doberman and an irish setter ...Tonight 7/6/12 at around  11pm i left my  house heading north on  seaside .At around 200 ft. looking  eastward jut above the tree line about 30ft in the air and 30 to 50 ft away from me...I saw what i can only discribe them as three very bright orange fire balls moving north/east in a triangle  formation...An orange color so vivid and bright with a darker center. nothing i have ever seen before ...They were moving nort/heast at around five  miles an hr..Very  slow ..As  i lost  them behind a  bulding three  more came  from  the  same  location then three more and three more.I counted twelve ufo's  flying  in  the  same triangle formation...Moving "floating more likely" with movements  so pricise,thru our sky . every so often one would dim to just a flashing light .Wow what a night. while all  this  was going on. my heart was beating so hard and racing like a race horse im able  to  think of  getting  my droidx2 and film  this amazing once in lifetime event.. but with two dogs pulling me in multiple directions i was only able to take  three shaky short videos..I wanted  to run and  call every one but i just  could not  take  my eyes off of them i  didnt  want to miss a second of  it(you blame  me ) i know of nothing that can fly that speed,  move in silence ,with such precision  and stay up in the air, made on earth  .....To all  the  people  that  think  these  were  chinise lanterns you werent there so dont tell me  what i saw...Ps,,these were no plane no helicopter [think of the sound these would make at that altitude] ... no chinise lantern no jupiter venus or mars .These were truley ufo's ....Wow thank god  i was there to witness this amazing event ....
content.summary: Ufo's over  dora st and seaside ave ..Stamford ct.

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i were talking near the front porch july 7, approximately 10-10:30 pm. i was facing the direction where the object came into view. i thought it was a shooting star about to hit the ground near us, but i didn't tell my friend, thinking it would be gone before he could turn around. but it didn't land or burn out, and i actually knew it wasn't what i had first thought, and that a shooting star was just the logical thing for me to think. it was so close and so bright that my friend saw it in the corner of his eye and turned immediately. we both kept saying, "what is it? what is it?" it had all the characteristics of a bubble, seeming to change shape a little, as a bubble would, almost round, slightly oblong. in the middle was an extremely bright gaseous-looking fire. around the fire was a glow, and around the glow was a duller glow which filled in the remaining shape of the bubble. it came from the ne and was traveling sw, and seemed to be about 3 feet in diameter, and traveling approximately 20 mph. it first came into view after passing over the house clearing the roof. it seemed to be at least 80 feet from the ground because it was not hitting houses or trees. it also appeared to be approaching in a downward direction, maybe down to 60 feet, then leveling out. i said to run into the street to get a clear view away from trees. we had a fairly clear view anyway because it was so bright that it shined through the tree branches, similar to the light in a kerosene lamp, only much larger. we watched it move in a very deliberate manner, as if it knew where it was going, without hitting anything. it didn't burn out at all or change speed while we could see it. i think i saw it about a minute, and my friend saw it longer, because i ran into the house to get a camera and car keys so we could follow it. too late. no photo. we could not find it after driving around for about 10 minutes. it was too fast and houses were in the way before we even got out of the driveway. i reported it to the police. there was a shift change and they did not yet know if any other reports had come in before mine. the officer believed me, saying he'd seen things also, that could not be explained. i'm glad i was with someone. i'd like to see it again. however, when i saw a "flying saucer" many years earlier, hovering just above, or landed on the next door neighbor's house, i was so shocked that i never wanted to see anything like that again. being with another witness makes it easier to keep composed. it has affected me greatly, to the point where i want answers and can't get it off my mind.
content.summary: Transparent 3 ft bubble w/bright flame in center moving appr 20 mph 80 ft high, missing trees/bldgs, 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I live near an airport and live in a 4th floor apartment on the eastern side of queens, ny and have a pretty clear view from my balcony of the area between the border of queens and manhattan, and good views of the manhattan skyline.  i often see plans that appear to be heading towards la guardia airport for a landing, and these plans are always flying in the same direction...Sort of along the east river in a northeasterly direction towards la guardia airport.

tonight i thought it odd that a plane appeared to be flying at a 90 degree angle to that of most planes.  instead of flying in a northeasterly direction it was flying more east.  i watched as it flew just south of my apartment building continuing east and deeper over queens.  i wondered 'could this be a ufo?!'.So i decided to bend down towards the ground and look upward as the plane was flying closer to my building.  while it looked plane like, i thought the lights were odd....I seemed to see lights in four perfect corners....Whereas usually with a plane i think you see the wing lights (and the wings are naturally spread out wider than the rest of the plane) and then i think you might see flashing lights maybe at the nose and the tail?  but with this object, all the lights seemed to be solid...No flashing lights..And again, it was the fact that the four lights were each in a corner of what appeared to be shaped like a perfect square.

maybe it was just my imagination but that coupled with the unusual flight direction got me wondering.....
content.summary: Plane-like behavior and appearance except for unusual flight pattern considering i live near an airport

content.detailedDescription: We were looking at a bright light that looked  like mars. to the upper right of it somthing started moving at a very fast speed with a bright light. it made us think of ufo's. then it all the sudden disapeared. after about 2 minutes it reapeared to the right of "mars" and did a 180' under mars and started moving left and while it was going left it apeared with 3 lights in a boomerang .We went and grabbed binoculars but when we got back. it was gone and we didn't see it again..
content.summary: Apeared and reapeared once, changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: I live in eastpointe michigan and i went outside at 3:34am july 8th, 2012 and saw what i thought was a satellite as it didn't have any flashing lights and moving quicker than a plane.  it was going in a straight line from south to north.  but what caught my attention was it started off about as bright as a satellite, but then started getting brighter.  it become the brightest thing in the sky next to the moon.  but then as quick as it got bright it started getting dim again.  then it just disappeared in front of me.
content.summary: Ufo spotted july 8, 2012 in michigan

content.detailedDescription: Cleanijng the driveway after fireworks observed three lights west of wheaton. initially two, then the third appeared. all were bright red, but not flashing like airplanes, there were no other lights (like white that airplanes have as well). light number one was closest to me, light number two was slightly behind, then third light appeared in the distance. all the same steady red color. light number two sped up and started gaining on light number one. they seemingly meted and then separated. all of a sudden one of the lights disappeared. i looked to see where the third light was but it disappeared as well. i went back to watching the remaining light. it started to change color from bright red to bright white. when it became bright white it seemingly turned up toward the sky and disappeared in the middle of my field of vision.Strange...
content.summary: Three red lights one overtaking other, suddenly canting collor and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened by the dogs, it was about 330am and i let them out.  i looked up at the sky and noticed two or three objects in the sky like stars.  so i got my camera and took a video as i had seen the same thing a week or so earlier and wanted to get a good not shakey picture.  i didnt have my camera stand the week earlier and i wanted to be ready to get a better picture, video if there was a next time.  i saw them and i got the camera, the stand and took a good long video.  no one i have shown it to has ever seen anything like it.  i sent a picture to jim in tuson and he said fill out a form and send it to you guys so thats what im doing.  its really scarey and i hope they dont bother any of us.  i really didnt want to see this but wanted to see what the heck they were. i didnt know if it was a satallite, it wasnt.  no idea what it is.  it kind of looks like a star in the distance, then as i put the zoom of the camera it looks round and then it gets close enough that you can seen it is six sided, pulsates, glowing, looks beige/tan in color.  the thing, both of them one in the real distance i cant get focused as well as the one closer.  and they both move, like drift up down to the side.  strange.  i dont want to look anymore but my curiosity is getting the best of me.  i took the video they went to bed i was really tired, so i dont know how long the objects were in the sky.
content.summary: Let dogs out about 3am and saw two lights in distance got camera took video with camera stand had seen it a week earlier and i wanted to be ready if they showed up again

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i and our large dog were in the car headed to the supermarket at dusk, approximately 8pm-ish, and the sky was still light because it was early september and still summer weather. we were on a backroad in the residential area and when we turned a corner to head into the back parking lot area of the supermarket, we were entirely shocked to see a glowing, red-orange, oval-egg shaped, solid object hovering in a stationary position, approximately 8 stories above the ground. my mom was intrigued and she drove the car closer to the object, so we were almost right under it but far enough away so we could still see it through the front windshield, and she put the car in park but left the engine running. our dog put his head out the window and he looked up and saw the object and began to bark incessantly while staring at it. the object was solid, and it seemed to be made of a light silver white metal in appearance, but it glowed with a deep orange red hue that changed its intensity and color distribution over the object, almost as if the hue was a product of high heat, or some type of propulsion by product. the orange red hue did not give off any glare whatsoever. the object was spinning at a moderately slow pace, in a clockwise direction. we observed it for about 3 to 5 minutes and it did not move up or down, but hovered and kept on spinning at the same pace. then my mom and i saw in the distance, in the area past and behind the object, and at a higher altitude,  two black helicopters flying towards the object at a fast pace. they quickly were over the object and decended to the objects altitude and each helicopter took up a position on each side of the object and facing the object. each helicopter had its side door open, and in each helicotper a male in dark military looking "fatiques" went to the open door and used spotlight to shed light on the object.  the object had not moved from its position during the entire time the helicopters moved in on it, but when the spotlights fell on it, it began to spin faster and glow more intensely in the red orange hue.  within 1 minute approximately, the object accelerated upward incredibly quickly and entirely vanished, seemingly because it accelerated even more quickly out of range. the helicopters were left with the beams of light still shinning where the object had been, and then they both took off very quickly, one going upwards in the direction the object had gone, and one back in the direction they had come from.
content.summary: Hovering oval shaped craft, black helicopters shined spotlights on it

content.detailedDescription:
On dec 30th, 1977, at approximately midnight, i and my parents got home from visiting friends and my dad went for an evening stroll. he came back to our home within minutes and told us to go outside with him to view a light in the sky which was making unconventional maneuvers.
my mom and i went outside and looked up where he had seen the object and we saw a white, bright object in the sky.  the visibility was perfectly clear, and i could see it was definitely not one of the stars in the sky, or a plane, or helicopter. the object was directly above us, at about a 90 degree angle to the horizon, and it appeared to be at a high altitude. it was moving from north to south across the sky but it then reversed direction entirely and took off at a faster speed in the opposite direction. it then reversed direction again and took off again in a northern direction.  the light did not pulsate and it did not give off any glare. we observed it until it moved beyond our visibilty.
content.summary: Bright, white light object , reversed direction with incredible ease

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july 7th, 2012 @ 1035pm i took my dog out in the backyard before bed. only he just kept crying and then he sat down and looked towards the sky. i turned around and looked to my right and there was 3 glowing fireballs hovering in the sky then i noticed another one fly up and join them. never seeing anything like this in my life, i ran in the house and yelled for my son to come outside and see what i was seeing. he came outside along with my brother.  we noticed more of these fireballs flying in a crooked line but very evenly spaced. they just kept coming!!! then they looked to stop and hover in a certain section of the sky then one by one would accend upward. my son ran into the house and grabbed his i phone and was able to take a few picture's and a 5 second video. i counted at least 22 of them. they would follow the same path one after another then hover in a certain area of the sky, then start accending one by one then they would fade out. they were north of the santa monica airport and to the south of the 10 fwy..They were coming in from the ocean going in a south-easternly direction. they made no sound at all. it was also a overcast night with no winds. never in my life have i seen anything in the sky that bright..It took my breath away and left me shaking with excitement. its something that you cant take your eyes off of..Wow!!!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireballs in the sky above west los angeles, calif. july 7, 2012@ 1035pm

content.detailedDescription: Approximately around 11:30 pm est, a friend and myself were heading northwest on remembrance rd from leonard st when i noticed a strange light in the sky above a neighborhood. at first i thought it was a helicopter, however the light pattern was completely different and there was no noise. i looked back at my passenger and she was starring up at it as well. i pulled over into a large driveway on the north side of the road to get a better look. once i shut off my motorcycle we both noticed that the object had no noise. the object was approximately 100-150ft in the sky and about 100 yards away from me. initially i noticed three bright lights, equally spaced apart, and two smaller blue lights between the larger white lights. all of these were solid. once i removed my helmet i immediately noticed a solid red light which appeared to be on the underside of the object. three smaller white lights surrounded this red one. since the object was stationary, and it was dark out, i could not make out a shape to it. within 30 seconds of observing the object, it suddenly started moving at about 5-10 mph in a southward direction. we continued to watch it slowly move, and with 10-20 seconds another side of the object was revealed. this was the most startling point in the observation. on this nearly viewable side, a series of white rectangle lights, side by side, we're pulsating from left to right, like a light bar. the object appeared to be a triangular shape. the object continued to head south at a slow pace and disappeared over the tree line. having always been uncomfortable, yet fascinated, with the subject of ufos, i was extremely anxious and confused. my passenger as well was frightened. i proceeded to drop her off a couple miles away (northwest). i did not decide to try and follow the object, regretfully, because of how frightened i was. as i was heading home, i started crossing the grand river, near downtown grand rapids, on ann st. (us-131s exit) and going over the river there is a perfect view south of downtown grand rapids. i did not see any sign of the object. once upon arriving home i did some research online and what i saw matched other sightings in grand rapids.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo hovering over houses, then suddenly headed south at slow speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to check on mail and was instantly focused on the amazing cloud formation with the sunny day, with patches of rain.
the clouds i believe were  mammatus clouds after comparing on-line.
 this is when i noticed the 2 ...Shapes in the air, at first i thought they where eagles or a large bird , but realizing how high up it could not possibly be a bird or anything but something very large. 
i followed them kinda floating it seemed then moved south in a pattern that 2 planes might make, there was no after trail and they kept together then slowly turned east and then abruptly vanished... i suppose into the cloud formation which would have made their altitude higher than i previously thought.
i have seen many planes circle or come into the city day and night and this is where i draw my comparative size from, the size was very large and i understand the disappearing" into the clouds would seem that way from the ground ... but the way they seemed to move in the sky was strange to begin with , i then went back into house and took a picture of the sky and clouds, took my phone back inside then remembered i forgot mail and went back out and clouds had dispersed and a bright sunny day, all seemed surreal. 
probably a few planes from hill air-force, but after i came inside and started to look to see if anyone else might have seen them this day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Large plane shaped, but not a long tail (if any) thought at first eagles or hangliders, but very large for how high in the sky, shortly after was able to compare to commercial passenger plane. dark kinda smokey look to both "aircraft"

content.detailedDescription: On lawn at cottage with telescope to look at stars when one of our party said look at that bright object. enough time elapsed for two other sslook at and locate the comet or meteor enter the atmosphere. it reminded two of us of an observation when driving to cedar point ohio several year ago.To
content.summary: Evening sky looking north over pine lake. 3 people observed comet with tail enter atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving home from jbox and there was a pink orb looking light hovering over bothell everett hwy we opened the windows and it was not making any sound it was just hovering in little circles above us then shot away north bound.
content.summary: Pink orb light

content.detailedDescription: There was a large group of people gathered to watch fireworks in kohler, wi on july 4th.  just before the fireworks started at 10:00 p.M. someone pointed out an object in the sky. it looked like a fireball and was traveling from the northeast to the southwest.  was still watching it when the fireworks started. i did video it with my iphone for a few minutes.
content.summary: Wittnessed an unknown object in the sky traveling from northeast to southwest

content.detailedDescription:
Tri-cities washington
on june 12, 2012 about 10:20pm i took our dogs outside to do their normal nightly stuff before we go to bed. 
we live outside of town on 5 acres, "it is quite out here at that time of night", while i was standing outside in my back yard with our dogs i noticed a couple of lights running along the ridge on a hillside behind our house to the south. the lights appeared at first, to be a couple of fire trucks running the hillside chasing a fire or something (the lights were heading west away from me at that time). as i watched i started to listen for engine noise, "nothing" i heard nothing, no motor vehicle sound, jet noise, humming -  nothing. i continued watching the lights wondering what these trucks were doing up there how come i couldn't hear them and at that time of night. 
the lights then came to the end of the hillside and continued into the skyline now heading west, northwest. i started yelling for my wife to come look at them, but she was brushing her teeth in the master bathroom which has some windows facing the skyline in which the lights were now moving. i ran in and had my wife look out the window. she saw the lights moving across the horizon which now seemed to be moving more northerly. the lights continued across the valley towards the hillside to the north of us. we then moved to the front of the house, which faces north and stepped outside on the front walkway and saw that the lights started moving east, northeast. at that time my wife went to grab her camera and tried to video the lights, but she had forgotten to put a memory card in the camera, so she didn't get any pictures or video. i then tried to take a video with my phone but it was very dark and i couldn't see anything thru my phone. the lights continued till they went behind the hillside directly north of us. a few seconds later re-appearing a long distance away, due north of the hilltop and high in the sky. the lights then started ascending till they were completely out of sight. just moments after they were no longer visible i noticed a satellite or something move across the sky moving from the wsw towards ene. we were both speechless and left wondering what we had seen. the lights appeared to be connected and about 900 ft apart. feeling like i needed to come to a conclusion regarding what we had seen several days later i went online o find anything similar to what we saw and found that similar lights to these have been seen all over the country and in other countries as well. pretty interesting, but..... on july 7th i took my wife and another out to dinner and as we were telling our friend about what we had seen i looked at my gallery in my phone and noticed that i had recorded a video the night of the sighting and i decided to see if i had got any video of the lights and not just black like i thought. turns out i did! the video is shaky and short but it did happen to catch the lights and i even zoomed in for a moment. not a high quality video but it is what it is and what ever it was we saw was real and big.
whether or not it was from out of this world or just something that the government is flying around, we will probably never know but just wanted to share what we had seen.
content.summary: Lights moving along hilltop then across sky then up and away,

content.detailedDescription:
Description of event: 
a bright orange fire like light defiantly above the water, but below any flight path. moving along the coastline but about a mile past the breakers, it was directly out to sea from us when we noticed it. we watched it move south, fade, grow bright and move north beyond us, it did not ascend or decend,but moved parallel to the coast.  a pale orange beam shone from it faintly and passed over the beach.It would repeat this for several passes then it moved north and do the same thing after  about an hour and a half, we watched it fade from view. we noticed it again about 15 minutes later down by  ocean shores doing the same s to n, while shining its faint orange beam on the shore, fade grow bright. it continued to do this until we left the beach at about 3:45 am i took picturesz with my cellphone. we noticed it at approximately 1 am, while we were taking down our tarp/ canopy beach shelter. we saw a car���s headlights  stop down the beach and pause as if they also saw it. a nearby truck parked perpendicular to the waterturned its headlights on, and a light flickered off in the camper up the beach. there was easily 4 or 5 people illuminated by moonlight stopped, about a mile down the beach and pointing out to sea. iwe had noticed earlier (about 8 or 9 pm) in the evening 4-5 red lights floating around, moving like fireflies, after a little online research from my beach chair we decided they were probably chinese lanterns,

what we thought at the time of the event: we spent several minutes discussing what we could be seeing, the following is what we came up with.:
at first glance, we thought it was a fishing vessel on fire and watched for a moment, we had seen fvs earlier that evening and could see that this was to large and bright, and moving to fast and to distinctly to be a fishing vessel, especially one on fire.
 we then speculated  it could be a coast guard search helicopter, if someone had gone out swimming or missing earlier in the day, there would be a coast guard response. but we didn���t hear any chopper blades or engine noises, although my boyfriend heard  a ���distant, high piched squeal��� , the only real reason we thought it was a coast guard helicopter was because the ���searchlight��� was  the beam of orange light that illuminated an area the size of a beach ball���on the beach, the light was over a  mile away and out to sea and covering a distance of almost 30 miles in less than a minute pointing its light on the beach, moving at speeds that would be impractical for search vehicles.
there has been a noticeable amount of military air movement (chinooks, armed helicopters, etc) a few miles inland over the last several months, and there are naval bases on the beach further north, so my initial assumption was a military exersize, but then why would the military be active in such a way on the most popular beach day of the year when literally thousands of people were on that beach just a few hours earlier and dozens still were, their campfires dotted the beach for miles.  
to us it seemed the ���beam��� emanating from the light was scanning the beach almost mapping it per se because of the movement of the light ( in a past job i used a scanner all day every day, the movement of the source light  reminded me of, the parts of a copier or scanner just beneath the glass) whatever it was it was obviously there, doing something, and not being interfered with and everyone on the beach knew they saw it.
content.summary: A bright orange fireball moving south to north about a mile past the breakers, it moved in a lightningbolt pattern south to northfade like it was moving out to sea and grow bright as if it was moving inland and continue north it emiting a beam onshore

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:45 am july, 5 2012 i was leaving for work and, as i was closing my driveway gate, something orange in the sky caught my eye.

i should note at this point that fireworks were still being shot at the time, however, i can say with 100 percent certainty this was not a firework.

it was a spherical, orange glowing orb floating across the horizon. the best way i can describe it is like a large, translucent bag with convoluted flames contained inside. size/distance away is hard to judge, but it seemed like it was very high up(guess 1 mile or more). size from my point of view would be comparable to the moon. 

the ball traveled in a straight line toward the northeast, until it was no longer visible behind the treeline. it crossed the horizon in about 20 seconds (appeared to be moving slow for it's perceived size, if that makes sense- kind of like watching a very high airplane move across the sky.

there was no sound, winds were calm from what i remember.

i first thought it was paper from a firework on fire, then realizing it was too far up, thought it may have been a shuttle launch. however, it had no trail, and the shape was orb-like from my perspective. it was very bizarre, to say the least. i have seen many meteors, and this, i don't believe was one. i have never seen anything like it in my lifetime, and it is hard for me to describe in words.

thanks for you time.
content.summary: Spherical orange fireball slowly crosses night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in a rural location going to my car and looked up for no particular reason and saw a "star" flying much faster than any plane. i only saw it for a few seconds traveling from east to west before it just disappeared. at first i thought it was a plane but saw no blinking lights at all and realized it was moving much too fast to be a plane. it appeared to be much below the stars and barely above the treeline. this is the fourth star-like object i have seen whiz through the sky at this same location. i continued to stare up into the sky for at least another ten to fifteen minutes to see if i would see any more. last time i saw three right in a row and almost exactly at the same time of night. this one was more bright white in color than the other three that appeared to be almost gray. the sky around it appeared extremely dark and although i did not notice it blocking out the stars as it was a clear night, the sky almost looked fuzzy. i was amazed that i was seeing another one and wonder if there is a reason for this or if it is just a coincidence.
content.summary: Saw star-like object zoom across sky at much higher speed than any plane.

content.detailedDescription:
We went to 4th of july fireworks on wed. 
after the fireworks display we were waiting in traffic and noticed two large round glowing objects hovering over the full moon. cheri and
her boyfriend were in the truck in front of our car and  started
pointing to the sky and duke and i saw it also. we watched them intently and there was no sound. there were several hundred people 
around . these objects hovered around pulsating ,first stationary then moving around the full moon. making weird movements.
 then we looked away for a second to turn into a parking area
so we could watch them and they disappeared! they were one fourth the size of the moon in comparison. and moved erratically ,and were silent .
i wondered if were there any more strange reports about unidentified flying objects that night? i researched google and there were many ufo sightings  on july 4th and july 5th ,2012 around the full moon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: After the fireworks display we were waiting in traffic and noticed two large round glowing objects hovering over the full moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding with my mother back home on gray highway. when we both noticed a metal craft in the sky, that was just hovering. it had no wings, no propellers, and had no motion. i first noticed it because the sun reflected brightly off of it. i thought it was a plane at first but then i noticed it wasn't moving. once i noticed it wasn't moving, i kept watching it as we drove down the highway. i figured that it would come more in focus and i would realize it was just a helicopter. the longer i watched the more i realized this was not normal. i lost sight of the object in an instant. it was as if the craft was hovering and then immediately accerlated to an incredible speed. it was in the west. it must have taken a western flightpath. for how fast it apparently moved though, it could have moved in any direction.
content.summary: It was a hovering metallic craft. it had no wings, no propellers. within the blink of an eye was gone.
